mapper.select: select t.fc_id_tuserpwd,t.fc_pwd_value,t.fi_error_input_count,t.fd_lock_date from t_os_user_pwd t where t.fc_cust_no = #{custNo} and t.fc_pwd_type = #{pwdType}
mapper.update: update t_os_user_pwd t set t.fd_lock_date = '' ,t.fi_error_input_count = 0 where t.fc_id_tuserpwd = #{FC_ID_TUSERPWD}
update t_os_user_info t set t.fc_state = '3' where t.fc_cust_no = #{custNo}
update t_os_user_pwd t set t.fi_error_input_count = t.fi_error_input_count + 1 where t.fc_cust_no = #{custNo}
delete t_os_user_pwd t where t.fc_cust_no = #{custNo} and t.fc_pwd_type = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT T.fc_CUST_NO custNo, T.fc_IDENTITY_TYPE identityType, T.fc_IDENTITY_NUM identityNum, T.fc_NAME name, T.fc_CUST_TYPE custType, T.fc_IS_TRADE isTrade, T.fc_MOBILE mobile, T.fc_LOGIN_BY_MOBILE loginByMobile, T.fc_EMAIL email, T.fc_LOGIN_BY_EMAIL loginByEmail, T.fc_AUTHE_INFOR , T.fc_STATE state from t_os_user_info t where t.fc_mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT T.FC_CUST_NO custNo, T.FC_IDENTITY_TYPE identityType, T.FC_IDENTITY_NUM identityNum, T.FC_NAME name, T.FC_CUST_TYPE custType, T.FC_MOBILE mobile, T.FC_LOGIN_BY_MOBILE loginByMobile, T.FC_CUST_TYPE custType, T.FC_IS_TRADE isTrade, T.FC_LOGIN_BY_EMAIL loginByEmail, T.FC_EMAIL email, T.FC_AUTHE_INFOR , T.FC_STATE state FROM T_OS_USER_INFO T WHERE 1 = 1 and t.fc_state = '0' AND (T.FC_IDENTITY_NUM = #{loginId} OR (T.FC_MOBILE = #{loginId} AND T.FC_LOGIN_BY_MOBILE = '1') OR (T.FC_EMAIL = #{loginId} AND T.FC_LOGIN_BY_EMAIL = '1') OR T.FC_FUND_ACCOUNT = #{loginId})
